name: shoot itt !
description:
NOT A SIMPLE SHOOTING GAME 

GO AHEAD AND GIVE IT TRY!

OUR RED CAPSULE IS ON MISSION TO ELIMINATE ALL OUR CAPSULE ENEMIES SO GO AHEAD AND KILL THEM ALL!!

INSTRUCTIONS:-

ARROW OR WASD KEYS TO MOVE.

RIGHT MOUSE CLICK TO SHOOT.

PRESS SPACEBAR TO CHANGE MUSIC.

PRO TIP:-

 IF YOU COLLIDE WITH OBSTACLES OR ENEMY YOUR PLAYER WILL GET WEIRD MOVEMENTS SO ALL THE BEST

IF PLAYER GETS HITTED BY  ENEMIES FOR 3 TIMES YOU ARE DEAD HONEY !

THIS GAME IS MADE IN 2 DAYS FOR NIKHIL MALANKAR'S GAME JAM.

THANKYOU!
